channel.title: Trying To Switch Clients | Repping Helpers
channel.description:
I downloaded a Delta source and client, I just simply want to use a different client, how can I do so?
PS: I have the client I want to use.

item.title: Trying To Switch Clients | Repping Helpers
item.dc:creator: @llcoolchris llcoolchris
item.description:
@llcoolchris wrote:

Xevi:

Tried server.java, I searched for everything that had: localhost, and serverip. and changed everything that needed changing

as i stated above it has nothing to do with local host or the ip address. it has to do with your client and server dont match you need to change the (server sided) client id to the new client id

The oither people who have replied are thinking that your client has the ip wrong, if you push login and it trys to login but then boots you off you need to change the client id server sided

but if you try to login and it doesnt do anything then search client sided for serverip =, i would use a z file searcher.

and if it has to do with it not login in general this belongs in client help not server help.

to help you even further search for the port client sided. it might be different from port server sided.

Here

Well I do not have a deltascape/317 anymore only 608’s+ so i can’t get the exact code. If it isn’t the port or the ip address and it is having trouble logging in (as it logs in for a quick second and then kicks you) reply and i will make a small tut thing here how to change the client id to the one you need. mine as well. I get kinda frustrated sometimes when people say “i wont spoonfeed” but how will anyone ever learn if they dont have guidance. tell me if the ip address/port did it or not.

Read full topic
item.source: Trying To Switch Clients | Repping Helpers

item.title: Trying To Switch Clients | Repping Helpers
item.dc:creator: @llcoolchris llcoolchris
item.description:
@llcoolchris wrote:

[quote=“Xevi, post:5, topic:456566”]I’m Using The Source From This: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517045.0.html
And The Client from This: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=407757.0

Nothing has worked so far, so if someone could do it for me, and add them in one folder with a download link, that would be awsome.[/quote]

lol cause none is correct, it is server sided, you have to know what your client version is, i believe it is in a server.java or setting.java file. i’d try searching for “version” or the likes. has nothing to do with the ip.

EDIT: This file also has to do with one of the first steps of adding two worlds.

EDIT EDIT: I am sorry not to be an ass but this is not a soon feeding site. you need to find your old client version and the new one. search for the id server sided and change it to the new version.

Hinted more<

Read full topic

item.title: Trying To Switch Clients | Repping Helpers
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

[quote=“Meh i own, post:2, topic:456566”]You just have to change the ip the client is going to connect to. Therefore search like 0.0.0.0 and open the client.java and switch that to your ip and then i forgot but there is one other file and search 127.0.0 and change it to your ip

Rep Highly Appreciated!= if this helps[/quote]

By Ip he means your registered no-ip. That way your friends can connect, if its on 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 then only you can connect, because those are localhosts.

Read full topic
